about_the_game:
Violent street gang wars have rocked the city. What do you remember about the main urban bands of the “USSR phenomenon” of the 1987s? Feel those times for yourself.


GAME DESCRIPTION:


Violent street gang wars shook the city. What are the main gangster groups of the “urban phenomenon” of the 1987s remembered for? “Kazlevsky” will tell us all about this with his program.

You will play the role of Vova, nicknamed “Chushpan”, who comes home two years after serving in the USSR army. Vova has grown up and is not at all happy with the affairs that the local bandits are doing. Vova also has a brother “Marasmatic” with a name “Golum”, a very colorful character.

You have to fight a lot with enemies for the territory of the city, upgrade your character and go to the gym. Solving various kinds of situations, communicating with different characters, the storyline is very rich. You will also communicate and “INTERACT” with your girlfriend. Go to the store for bread and much more... a kind of simulator of life in difficult times of the USSR.

FEATURES:


  • Gang fights

  • Everything in the style of the 90s

  • Cool graphics

  • Funny animations

  • Lots of hand-to-hand techniques

  • Soundtrack straight from the 90s

  • Story quests

  • Very colorful characters

  • Large expanses of the city of the USSR

  • Bosses in crimson jackets



In the game you will find an interesting plot, a lot of jokes, interesting gameplay that will not let you get bored.

All characters, events, music and locations are completely fictional, any coincidences with real people, other works, films and games are random.

content_descriptors.notes:
Attention! Viewer discretion is advised. The game
contains scenes of violence and blood.

name: CHUSHPAN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 820m
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel CORE i7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit
